attributes.action: Immediate Air Stikes on ISIS to protect further Executions of innocent UK and US Citizens
attributes.additional_details: It is time that our Government sent in the Planes and bomb all known sites where these Terrorists are and once and for all obliterate the lot , With the USA and intelligence they have they know exactly where they are. Let our Prime minster finally grow a pair of Balls and authorize these air Strikes and once and for all get rid of this threat to the World. we don't need to send troops in on the Ground Air Strike them and keep at it one after the other until we have rid of these people and their leaders. Those that are British that have joined this group have to face the consequences for their actions , They gave up their British Citizenship the minute they decided to join this Group and become a terrorist., Please David Cameron don't allow another person to be executed ACT TODAY and help free the world of these Terrorists ...... Please share and now is the time to petition your MP or Direct to the PM himself , Clogg up the emails , make our voices heard
